message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at your share.
Let's split fairly, considering I'm the one losing value over time.
The longer we wait, the less your share is worth, Bob.  This is a fair offer, take it while you can.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a better deal considering the inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Another refusal and you'll be getting even less than this. Take the deal!
